title: merge
contents:
mode_edit code
API / rxjs/index

mergelink

Creates an output Observable which concurrently emits all values from every given input Observable.

创建一个输出 Observable，它会同时从每个给定的输入 Observable 中发送所有值。

Flattens multiple Observables together by blending their values into one Observable.

通过将多个 Observable 的值混合到一个 Observable 中来将多个 Observable 扁平化。

merge subscribes to each given input Observable (as arguments), and simply forwards (without doing any transformation) all the values from all the input Observables to the output Observable. The output Observable only completes once all input Observables have completed. Any error delivered by an input Observable will be immediately emitted on the output Observable.

merge 订阅每个给定的输入 Observable（作为参数传入），并简单地将所有输入 Observable 中的所有值转发（不做任何转换）到输出 Observable。只有在所有输入 Observable 都完成后，输出 Observable 才会完成。输入 Observable 传递的任何错误都会立即在输出 Observable 上发送。

Exampleslink

例子link

Merge together two Observables: 1s interval and clicks

将两个 Observable 合并在一起：“一秒定时”和“点击”

import { merge, fromEvent, interval } from 'rxjs'; const clicks = fromEvent(document, 'click'); const timer = interval(1000); const clicksOrTimer = merge(clicks, timer); clicksOrTimer.subscribe(x => console.log(x)); // Results in the following: // timer will emit ascending values, one every second(1000ms) to console // clicks logs MouseEvents to console every time the "document" is clicked // Since the two streams are merged you see these happening // as they occur.

Merge together 3 Observables, but run only 2 concurrently

合并 3 个 Observable，但同时运行 2 个

import { interval, take, merge } from 'rxjs'; const timer1 = interval(1000).pipe(take(10)); const timer2 = interval(2000).pipe(take(6)); const timer3 = interval(500).pipe(take(10)); const concurrent = 2; // the argument const merged = merge(timer1, timer2, timer3, concurrent); merged.subscribe(x => console.log(x)); // Results in the following: // - First timer1 and timer2 will run concurrently // - timer1 will emit a value every 1000ms for 10 iterations // - timer2 will emit a value every 2000ms for 6 iterations // - after timer1 hits its max iteration, timer2 will // continue, and timer3 will start to run concurrently with timer2 // - when timer2 hits its max iteration it terminates, and // timer3 will continue to emit a value every 500ms until it is complete

merge(...args: (number | SchedulerLike | ObservableInput<unknown>)[]): Observable<unknown>

参数

args (number | SchedulerLike | ObservableInput<unknown>)[]

返回值

Observable<unknown>: an Observable that emits items that are the result of every input Observable.

一个 Observable，它发送的条目是每个输入 Observable 的结果。

重载形式link

merge(...sources: [...ObservableInputTuple<A>]): Observable<A[number]>

参数

sources [...ObservableInputTuple<A>]

返回值

Observable<A[number]>
merge(...sourcesAndConcurrency: [...ObservableInputTuple<A>, number?]): Observable<A[number]>

参数

sourcesAndConcurrency [...ObservableInputTuple<A>, number?]

返回值

Observable<A[number]>
merge(...sourcesAndScheduler: [...ObservableInputTuple<A>, SchedulerLike?]): Observable<A[number]>

参数

sourcesAndScheduler [...ObservableInputTuple<A>, SchedulerLike?]

返回值

Observable<A[number]>
merge(...sourcesAndConcurrencyAndScheduler: [...ObservableInputTuple<A>, number?, SchedulerLike?]): Observable<A[number]>

参数

sourcesAndConcurrencyAndScheduler [...ObservableInputTuple<A>, number?, SchedulerLike?]

返回值

Observable<A[number]>
